{{Wired embedded system |brand=Arris |model=SB8200 |revision=(SURFboard) |ean=612572211373 |asin=B01N6SKK1G |price=200 |est_release_date=02/24/2017 |is_manuf=No |manuf=DareGlobal |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=cable modem |pcb_id=ARCT04227 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |serial=yes,, 4-pad header,, |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM3390Z;BCM3390ZKFSBG, TA1618 P20, 592347-21 P3 W; |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML01G200TFV00 |fla2=16 |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX25L12835FZ2I-10G |ram1=3 GiB |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=RF Amplifier;Maxim;MAX3522;MAX3522, CTN 612, NTBHSAD;1; ,,, 1.5MHz, 2.5A, Step-down DC-DC Converter;BCD Semiconductor;AP3432;3432, CMLG-I2, EET624, 5053755 W;1; ,,, 4.5V to 18V Input, 6A/3.5A Dual Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Texas Instruments;TPS65276V;TPS 65276V, TI 621, CDHK G4;3; |flags=DOCSIS 3.1, |default_ip=192.168.100.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui_eth=20:3D:66 }} {{TagLine|SURFboard DOCSIS 3.1 Cable Modem}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.arris.com/surfboard/products/cable-modems/sb8200/}} {{SupportPage|http://arris.force.com/consumers/ConsumerProductDetail?p=a0ha000000TnNQCAA3&c=SURFboard%20Cable%20Modems%20and%20Gateways}} DOCSIS 3.1 & 32x8 DOCSIS 3.0{{CableModemSpec |down_c=32 |up_c=8 }} *Compatible with major cable providers: :*{{Approved by service|Comcast}} ''Xfinity'' :*{{Approved by service|Cox}} ''Cable'' :''Comcast Xfinity'' and ''Cox Cable'' approved. :*{{Approved by service|Time Warner}} :*{{Approved by service|Brighthouse}} :*{{Approved by service|Charter}} :Spectrum (''Charter, Time Warner and Brighthouse'') :and others pending approval. Advanced monitoring with PRTG: [https://github.com/JJWatMyself/cabletools GitHub] ===Reviews=== *[http://www.mbreviews.com/arris-sb8200-review/ ''Arris SB8200 DOCSIS 3.1 Cable Modem Review'' on '''MBReviews'''] :[http://www.mbreviews.com/arris-sb8200-vs-netgear-cm1000/ ''Arris SB8200 vs Netgear CM1000: Which is the Best DOCSIS 3.1
Cable Modem?''] (CPU, Flash, RAM spec.) ===Forum threads=== *[https://www.dslreports.com/forum/r31219835-SB8200-32x8-3-1-cable-modem-Feedback-and-Results-thread~start=142 Teardown with internal images by ''xymox1'' on '''DSL Reports''' forum] :The Arris logo, "SB8200 ST MAIN BOARD.", "PWB:597403-001 RevM", :"PWB:ARCT04227" and "2016-10-20" are silkscreened on the PCB. :[https://www.dslreports.com/hardware/ARRIS-SB8200-h4544 Arris SB8200 Spec.] (OEM: [[DareGlobal]]) *[http://www.dslreports.com/forum/r31238946-Equip-CM1000-vs-SB8200 ''(Equip) Netgear CM1000 vs Arris SB8200'' on '''DSL Reports''' forum] :OUI: [http://hwaddress.com/?q=20:3D:66 20:3D:66] (ARRIS Group, Inc.), PSU: 12V/2A, ===See also=== [[List of DOCSIS Cable Modems]] *[[Arris SB6190]] - ''ARRIS SURFboard DOCSIS 3.0 Cable Modem'' *[[Arris SBG6700-AC]] - ''DOCSIS 3.0 Cable Modem/AC1600 WiFi Router'' :FCC ID: W5HSBG6782ACH (2013-05-20) - ''Wireless Gateway'' *[[Arris SVG2482-AC]] - ''DOCSIS 3.0 Cable Modem/AC1750 WiFi Router'' :W5HSVG7782HH (2013-04-11) - ''Wireless Cable Modem Gateway'' *[[Motorola SURFboard SBG6580]] - ''DOCSIS 3.0 Cable Modem/AC1750 WiFi Router'' :FCC ID: W5HSBG6580 (2010-01-18) - ''DOCSIS 3.0 Wi-Fi Gateway'' *[[ASUS CM-32]] - ''AC2600 WiFi 32x8 DOCSIS 3.0 Cable Modem Router'' *[[Motorola MB8600]] - ''DOCSIS 3.1 Ultra Fast Speed Cable Modem'' *[[Netgear CM1000]] - ''DOCSIS 3.1 Ultra-High Speed Cable Modem'' __NOTOC__
